name: A petrific day in the life of Ambrosius, the sorcerer
name_original: A petrific day in the life of Ambrosius, the sorcerer
description:
Ambrosius the sorcerer is taking a walk through the forest. To make things fun, he decided he will get creative and use a single spell to overcome all obstacles he  may come across with: Petrificus Temporarius. 

Made for Pixel Weekend Jam #1
